content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'covid19moderndw_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [covid19moderndw_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://covid19moderndw@covid19dtywy3evjk25c.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stg.onprem_dates_stg (
	[DateKey] bigint,
	[FullDate] varchar(2000),
	[isWeekDay] bit,
	[DayOfWeek] bigint,
	[DayOfMonth] bigint,
	[DayOfQuarter] bigint,
	[DayOfYear] bigint,
	[DayName] nvarchar(4000),
	[WeekOfYear] bigint,
	[WeekName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MonthOfYear] bigint,
	[MonthName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalendarQuarter] bigint,
	[CalendarQuarterName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalendarYear] bigint,
	[FiscalMonth] bigint,
	[FiscalMonthName] nvarchar(4000),
	[FiscalQuarter] bigint,
	[FiscalQuarterName] nvarchar(4000),
	[FiscalYear] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'dboDatesonprem.txt',
	DATA_SOURCE = [covid19moderndw_covid19dtywy3evjk25c_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stg.onprem_dates_stg
GO
